p: Moreover, it is only partially true that palm oil is bad for the environment. Palm oil is one of the most profitable resources of tropical regions, especially in Malaysia and Indonesia, allowing for economic development. However, environmental damage does exist: from 1990 to 2014, Indonesia lost an extended forestland area with considerable damages inflicted by deforestation. Therefore, in 2013 The Palm Oil Innovations Group set the goal of improve respect for the environment, avoiding deforestation and mistreatment of workers [ 48].
